where λare the dual variables and D(λ) = minx∈Rd L(x,λ).
Remark. In the discussion of Deﬁnition 7.1, we use two concepts that are
also of independent interest (Boyd and Vandenberghe, 2004).
First is the minimax inequality, which says that for any function withminimax inequality
